description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.  The delivery is requested at 25 CFSD Montreal. All firm deliverables are requested complete no later than 12 months after the date of issuance of the Contract.",
full_summary:
# Service Pin Presentation Box Contract
----------------------------------------------------

## Title and Reference
Service Pin Presentation Box Contract
CB-763-97057254 (Canadian Number)

## Solicitation and Contract Details
The Department of National Defence (DND) has published a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply of Service Pin Presentation Boxes. The solicitation number is W8486-249252/A.

### Tender Closing Date and Time
The tender closing date and time is February 15, 2024, at 14:00 hours.

### Contract Status
The contract status is expired.

### Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN)
Not available.

### Universal Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC)
**Presentation light boxes (45111618)**

### Procurement Method and Category
*   The procurement method is Competitive - Traditional.
*   The procurement category is Goods (GD).

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery
The items will be delivered in **Canada**, with specific delivery points in:

*   **Montréal**
*   **Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)**

### Contracting Entity and Contact Information
The contracting entity for this contract is the Department of National Defence. Please contact:

*   Robert Bonomo
*   Email: [DLP3Bids-DAAT3Soumissions@forces.gc.ca](mailto:DLP3Bids-DAAT3Soumissions@forces.gc.ca)
*   Phone: (819) 939-7504
*   Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0K2

### Tender Documents
The tender documents are available at the following URLs:

*   **English**: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28531/w8486-249252---solicitation-english-%28a1.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28531/w8486-249252---solicitation-english.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28531/w8486-249252---solicitation-english-%28a2.pdf
*   **French**: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28531/w8486-249252---solic
